text.en: Lord Guru, embodiment of the three kāyas,
text.en-trans: jé ku sum gyi daknyi lama la

text.en: I pray to you with intense and ferocious longing!
Father, if you don’t look upon me with compassion,
text.en-trans: pa khyé kyi tukjé ma zik na

text.en: I will have nowhere else to place my hope!
text.en-trans: mi dak la resa zhen namé

text.en: In the time since I first entered the gateway of Dharma,
text.en-trans: nga chögo la zhuk né danté bar

text.en: I have yet to find the fearless stronghold of certainty.
text.en-trans: sem mi jik tesö deng mi duk

text.en: What will I do if death comes to me right now?
text.en-trans: danta rang shi na chizhik ja

text.en: Please bless me that I may practice the Dharma from my heart!
text.en-trans: chö nying né jepa zhik jingyi lob

text.en: Though I make a pretense of striving in the threefold vows,
text.en-trans: dom sum la tsönpa jé khul kyang

text.en: I have still not cut through self-clinging, not one bit;
How on earth will I ever go beyond saṃsāra?
text.en-trans: khorwa lé tar tab chizhik yö

text.en: Please bless me that I may realize selflessness!
Even though I have spent my whole life practicing,
text.en-trans: drub la mitsé pü na yang

text.en: I still don’t see purity and equality, not even slightly;
How will I ever reach awakening in this life?
Please bless me to swiftly ripen in generation and completion!
text.en-trans: kyedzok nyurdu minpa zhik jingyi lob
